Arabic.  
  
 Arabic combined with another subject with 'C' grade 
including Education.  
(ii) UMYUK accepts two (2) 'A’ level passes in Arabic and 
any other Arts subjects. NCE credit in Arabic is also 
acceptable.  
(iii) ABU accepts  
(a) two (2) ‘A’ level/IJMB passes which must 
include Arabic.  
(b) NCE ‘C’ grade in Arabic.  (v)  ILORIN 
accepts candidates  
a. who do not offer Arabic at UTME but meet the UTME 
requirements they may be considered for admission 
into 100 level.  
b. with Senior Islamic Studies Certificates as entry 
qualification for Islamic Studies/Arabic and related 
programmes,they may also be considered.  
  
UTME  
(i) ABU accepts TC. II at credit/merit level.  
(ii) UMYUK requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in 
EnglishLanguage, Arabic and any other three (3) Arts 
subjects with 'O' levelcredit pass in Mathematics.  
(iii) ABUJA and LASU require five (5) 'O' level creditpasses to 
include Mathematics, Arabic and English Language.
